diagnosis.final_diagnosis: multiple myeloma with acute disseminated encephalomyelitis
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with symptoms including confusion, visual impairment, and neurological findings consistent with ADEM. Blood tests revealed elevated IgG levels and the presence of monoclonal protein consistent with multiple myeloma. MRI showed multiple white matter lesions, and bone marrow biopsy confirmed diffuse plasma cell infiltration characteristic of multiple myeloma.
